breadcrumbs.title: Register a vehicle for LEZ and ULEZ

texts: If we don't hold details for a vehicle registered outside the UK, we won't know if it meets the standards. You need to register this vehicle with our partner EPC plc if you believe it meets the required ULEZ and/or LEZ standard.
This may take up to 10 working days.
Until you register and prove your vehicle meets the standards, you'll need to pay the charges to drive in London. You can apply for a refund after your status has been confirmed.
All HGVs over 12 tonnes gross vehicle weight need to hold an HGV Safety Permit to prove they meet the Direct Vision Standard.
If you drive an HGV in Greater London at any time without a valid permit, you may receive a penalty charge notice (PCN).
If you don't have a permit for your vehicleÂ you can apply for one online .
